text: Those Awful Hats is a 1909 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithThose Awful HatsRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars Mack Sennett, Flora Finch, and Linda Arvidson. ==Actors== * Mack Sennett as Man in checkered jacket * Flora Finch as Woman with largest hat * Linda Arvidson as Theatre Audience * John R. Cumpson as Theatre Audience * George Gebhardt as Theatre Audience * Robert Harron as Theatre Audience * Anita Hendrie as Theatre Audience * Charles Inslee as Theatre Audience * Arthur V. Johnson as Theatre Audience * Florence Lawrence as Theatre Audience * Gertrude Robinson as Theatre Audience * Dorothy West as Theatre Audience ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Those Awful Hats
